entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
